summary: VBT Camera Phase 2 Testing Complete - All features verified. Backend APIs (8/8 tests pass). Frontend VBT Camera page loads correctly with camera permission prompt and back button working. TypeScript tracking services compile without errors.
critical_code_review_comments: barTracker.ts - Physics model well-implemented: uses pinhole camera model for pixel-to-meter conversion
useBarTracking.ts - Clean React hook implementation with proper state management
Bar tracking simulation works correctly for development/testing (useSimulation: true)
Velocity drop calculation with 10% threshold for fatigue detection implemented
vbt-camera.tsx - Proper data-testid attributes present on key elements
Camera permission handling works correctly on web (shows 'Camera permission required')
Back button with data-testid='vbt-camera-back-btn' present and functional

success_rate.frontend: 100% (VBT Camera page loads, permission prompt displays, back button works)

seed_data_creation: VBT data with provider='camera' created via test execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: VBT Camera Phase 2 tracking implementation verified. The bar tracking uses simulation mode (useSimulation: true) for web preview environment. Real MediaPipe tracking requires native iOS/Android build with react-native-vision-camera. Backend endpoint /api/vbt/data accepts 'camera' provider correctly. Frontend navigation: Athletes > Atleta Um > Assessments > Strength & VBT > VBT via Camera works.
features_verified: Tela VBT via Camera carrega corretamente - VERIFIED
Tela mostra solicitação de permissão de câmera - VERIFIED
Backend endpoint /api/vbt/providers retorna 'camera' como provider válido - VERIFIED
Arquivos de tracking service existem e compilam sem erros TypeScript - VERIFIED

mocked_api.Bar tracking simulation: MOCKED - Real MediaPipe tracking requires native build with react-native-vision-camera
